content.rendered:
Do some of the great classics appear on your child’s reading list for summer? Younger students are often (but not always) permitted to read versions of classics adapted to include kid-friendly vocabulary and reduce complexity. High schoolers must nearly always read the originals.

Bring your summer reading list to Gottwals!

Job Opening

Gottwals Books is looking for a full-time Facility Manager. Please send resumes to service@gottwalsbooks.com.

True Crime Selection

Fans of TV shows like Criminal Minds and CSI might want to check out the extensive True Crime selection at Gottwals Books! True Crime offers a mix of mystery, suspense, sleuthing, forensics, and justice. You may even find a book providing more background on your favorite “ripped from the headlines” episode.

Thanks to our Patrons!

We’ve been so pleased with the enthusiastic response to our new location on Riverside Drive. Things are still coming together and we appreciate all your support while we work through the process of sorting and shelving our expanded inventory. Our new address is 2834 Riverside Drive, between Riverview Road and Pierce Avenue (exit 167 on I-75.)

We’re Stocked!

A lot of fresh inventory going up on our shelves this week. Just look at the fiction to-be-shelved pile in our Warner Robins store!

Our New Corporate Headquarters & Warehouse

We are streamlining operations so that we can provide an even better, well-rounded selection at all Gottwals Books and Walls of Books locations.

Toy of the Week:

Mealtime Learning Mats: $2.97 each

Mat Crayon Packs: $1.97

Turn Lunchtime into Learning Time!

If you’re concerned about summer “brain drain” try the Melissa & Doug learning mats at lunch and snacktime. Choose from math, astronomy, geography, and handwriting exercises and your children can have fun learning while they eat!
